SERVICES_SECTION.services.security.title: Security & Auditing
SERVICES_SECTION.services.security.description: Professional smart contract audits and security assessments by ATLAS, our blockchain security specialist. We identify vulnerabilities, ensure code safety, and protect your project from exploits with military-grade security protocols.

SERVICES_SECTION.services.tokenomicsDesign.description: Data-driven tokenomics models crafted by MOMENTUM, our economics specialist. We design sustainable token economies with proven burn mechanisms, staking rewards, and deflationary strategies that ensure long-term growth and value appreciation.
SERVICES_SECTION.services.development.title: Smart Contract Development
SERVICES_SECTION.services.development.description: Enterprise-grade smart contracts and dApps built by NEXUS, SOLIDITY, and PRISM - our full-stack development team. From Solidity contracts to React frontends, we deliver production-ready code with 100% test coverage and gas optimization.
SERVICES_SECTION.services.marketing.title: Marketing & Growth
SERVICES_SECTION.services.marketing.description: Aggressive growth campaigns executed by MOMENTUM, our marketing CMO. We scale crypto projects from 0 to 10,000+ followers with proven strategies: Twitter automation, influencer partnerships, viral content, and community building that converts.
SERVICES_SECTION.services.community.title: Community Management
SERVICES_SECTION.services.community.description: 24/7 community engagement powered by PULSE, our community AI. Never miss a mention, question, or complaint. We manage Discord, Telegram, Twitter with instant responses, sentiment analysis, and proactive community building that keeps your holders loyal.

SERVICES_SECTION.services.design.description: Apple-level design crafted by PIXEL and VIBE, our design and brand specialists. We create logos, websites, and brand identities that look like $100M projects - even for startups. Modern, clean, and professional designs that inspire trust and investment.
SERVICES_SECTION.services.content.title: Content Creation
SERVICES_SECTION.services.content.description: Professional content from CONTENT, our writing AI. Whitepapers that investors actually read, technical docs that developers understand, and blog posts that rank on Google. SEO-optimized, technically accurate, and professionally formatted.
SERVICES_SECTION.services.devops.title: DevOps & Operations
SERVICES_SECTION.services.devops.description: Enterprise infrastructure managed by our DevOps team. CI/CD pipelines, Docker containers, AWS/Vercel deployments, monitoring, alerts, and 99.9% uptime. Your project stays online 24/7 while you focus on growth, not servers.
